name: Quoridor (The Gingerman)
description:
the start screen runs horribly on the browser version but I suppose the rest runs fine

how to play: use the options block to turn the sound on/off or to change the board size

the game has no player vs computer(at least not now) and is only player vs player

each player has to reach the side of the board opposite to the side they started at, once a player clicks on his character the see the blocks they can move to light up, instead of moving the player can try interrupting the other player by blocking their route, however the player cannot block a path if that completely blocks the other player or themselves from reaching the other side.
